Paragraph: One way to solve the trade - off between V OC and J SC of the PSC based on low band - gap polymers is to introduce arene groups which have weak electron - donating power.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| low band-gap polymers |
| arene groups |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: One way to solve the trade - off between V OC and J SC of the PSC based on low band - gap polymers is to introduce arene groups which have weak electron - donating power.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| VOC (Volatile Organic Compounds) |
| JSC (Junction Solar Cell) |
| PSC (Perovskite Solar Cell) |
| low band-gap polymers |
| arene groups |
| electron-donating power |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| VOC (Volatile Organic Compounds) |
| JSC (Junction Solar Cell) |
| PSC (Perovskite Solar Cell) |
| low band-gap polymers |
| electron-donating power |

Note: "arene groups" can be considered a type of functional group and can be considered a material property as it refers to a specific group that can affect the electronic properties of the material.
